name: DARK SPACE (itch) (Zakroutil)
description:
________________________________________________________________________________

After crash-landing on an unknown space station, you find yourself stranded in darkness, alone...

 The whole story is cryptic and is supposed to explore the feeling of loneliness and the importance of not giving up. Uncover the mystery surrounding yourself, the station and other locations you visit, by solving puzzles, overcoming unique challenges and defeating enemies in Dark Space an indie adventure side-scroller, created by just one developer.

________________________________________________________________________________

Make your way through four chapters, each providing new environments and mechanics.

Uncover the mystery of a cryptic story.

Master your jetpack boost ability and use it to traverse the environment.

Estimated playtime is 2 - 3 hours.

________________________________________________________________________________

________________________________________________________________________________

________________________________________________________________________________

Ex Machina is a free story expansion for Dark Space. Face new challenges, solve different puzzles, explore a brand new location and defeat the final boss!


Estimated playtime of the DLC chapter is 20 minutes.

________________________________________________________________________________

OS: Windows 7

Processor: Intel Core i5 4460 | AMD FX-8350

Memory: 4 GB RAM

Graphics: Nvidia GTX 850M | AMD Radeon HD 6990M

DirectX: Version 11

Storage: 9 GB available space
